example.code:
PS C:\> Remove-EC2VpnGateway -VpnGatewayId vgw-1a2b3c4d
Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action? Performing operation "Remove-EC2VpnGateway (DeleteVpnGateway)" on Target "vgw-1a2b3c4d". [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"):
example.description: This example deletes the specified virtual private gateway. You are prompted for confirmation before the operation proceeds, unless you also specify the Force parameter.
